anime.name: Chibi Maruko-chan
anime.info: #4: "KinKi no Yaru Ki Man Man Song" by KinKi Kids
#1: "Hari-kiri Jiisan no Rock 'n' Roll" by Hitoshi Ueki
#2: "Akke ni Torareta Toki no Uta" by Tama
#5: "Kyuujitsu no Uta (Viva La Viva)" by DELiGHTED MINT
#7: "Alala no Jumon" by Chibi Maruko-chan with Bakuchu Mondai
